ValidationRule.description: Prevent Unauthorized Users to update the SPA Form's Status in Final Approval Stage.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ByPassValidationRules__c), NOT($Setup.Bypass_Configuration__c.SPA_Form_Validation_Rule__c), OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Approved"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Denied") ), ISCHANGED(Status__c), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"Final Approval") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed change the status to Approved. Please, contact System Administrator .
